4.speaker: POLAR BEAR
4.definition: Good for you. Hey! Congratulate me {\i1}(omedetou){\i0}!

5.speaker: PENGUIN
5.character: それは　こんぺいとう！

6.speaker: PENGUIN
6.character: それは　エッフェル塔！

8.speaker: PENGUIN
8.definition: That's not it! That's not it at all! Congratulations.

12.speaker: PANDA
12.character: 永遠に取れないかと思ったよ
12.definition: I thought you'd never get it. That's not even funny.

13.speaker: PENGUIN
13.character: さぁ　これで　ペン子さんと…
13.definition: Now I can take Miss Penko...

14.speaker: PENGUIN
14.character: 海へ　ドライブだよ！
14.definition: for a drive to the ocean!

15.speaker: POLAR BEAR
15.definition: I don't know if it'll be that easy.

18.speaker: POLAR BEAR
18.character: 道を間違えて　海へ行くはずが 山へ行っちゃったり…
18.definition: You get lost and end up going to the mountains instead of the ocean.

19.speaker: POLAR BEAR
19.character: ギア　壊しちゃったり…

20.speaker: POLAR BEAR
20.character: ハンドル　引っこ抜いたり…

21.speaker: PENGUIN
21.character: いや　そんな失敗しないから
21.definition: No, I won't make any of those mistakes.

22.speaker: POLAR BEAR
22.character: でも　ただのドライブじゃないよね？
22.definition: But you're not just going on a drive, right?

23.speaker: POLAR BEAR
23.character: デートだよ　デート

24.speaker: POLAR BEAR
24.character: ペン子さんを助手席に乗せて
24.definition: You'll have to make interesting conversation

25.speaker: POLAR BEAR
25.character: 洒落た会話をこなしつつ
25.definition: with Miss Penko in the passenger seat while not getting lost. Can you do that? That's quite a mission.

26.speaker: PENGUIN
26.character: わかった！ 明日　予行演習しよう
26.definition: I know! Let's go for a practice run tomorrow!

27.speaker: PANDA
27.character: デートの練習って何するの？
27.definition: What do you do on a practice date?

28.speaker: POLAR BEAR
28.character: それは　いろいろ考えてあるから
28.definition: I've got it all figured out.

29.speaker: POLAR BEAR
29.character: ペンギンさん　おはよう

33.speaker: PANDA
33.character: なんで　こんなとこで寝てるの？
33.definition: Why are you sleeping here? Well, I got here three hours ago.

34.speaker: POLAR BEAR
34.character: 早いのはいいけど 寝るのは最悪だね
34.definition: It's good that you're early, but very bad to be sleeping.

35.speaker: POLAR BEAR
35.character: その１　待ち合わせ　不合格

38.speaker: POLAR BEAR
38.character: 合格しないと デートする免許がもらえないの
38.definition: If you don't pass, you don't get your dating license.

39.speaker: PANDA
39.character: デートにも免許がいるんだ？
39.definition: You need a license for dating, too?

41.speaker: PENGUIN
41.character: いや　普通いらないから

42.speaker: POLAR BEAR
42.character: ペンギンさん 今日は僕がデートの教官
42.definition: I'll be your dating instructor today, Mr. Penguin.

44.speaker: POLAR BEAR
44.definition: So, what's your plan for today?

47.speaker: POLAR BEAR
47.character: オシャレなレストランで食事したり
47.definition: No dinner at a fancy restaurant,

48.character: ムード盛り上げる演出はないの？
48.definition: or interesting plans to enhance the mood?

49.speaker: POLAR BEAR
49.character: 考えてなかったでしょ？
49.definition: You didn't think about that, did you? No. 2, Arrangements: Failed.

50.speaker: PANDA
50.character: 合格までの道のりは 厳しそうだね
50.definition: It looks like the path to passing is very hard.

51.speaker: PENGUIN
51.character: あとはどんなチェック項目があるの？
51.definition: What else is on that check list? No. 3, Fun Conversation.

52.definition: No. 4, Delicious Meal. No. 5, Romantic Mood. If you pass all of those, you'll receive a temporary license.

53.speaker: POLAR BEAR
53.character: で　ラブラブでドライブした最後に 愛の告白
53.definition: And after your love love drive, you confess your love.

54.speaker: POLAR BEAR
54.character: そうすれば ラブラブ免許を獲得できるよ
54.definition: If you can do that, you'll receive a love love license.

55.speaker: PENGUIN
55.character: えっ　ラブラブ免許？

57.speaker: POLAR BEAR
57.character: じゃあ　やり直してみよう

59.speaker: POLAR BEAR
59.definition: Good morning. Were you waiting long?

61.speaker: PENGUIN
61.character: 僕も　今　来たところだよ

62.speaker: POLAR BEAR
62.definition: Very nice. You passed. So what are we doing? First we'll go to a delicious restaurant, then to the ocean,

63.speaker: PENGUIN
63.character: ムードを盛り上げて 告白します　教官
63.definition: then I'll enhance the mood, and then I'll confess my love, Instructor! A bit awkward, but I guess you pass.

64.speaker: POLAR BEAR
64.definition: Let's go, then. I feel tired.

65.speaker: PENGUIN
65.character: シロクマくん　運転して

68.speaker: PANDA
68.character: ペンギンさん持ってない？
68.definition: Do you have any, Mr. Penguin?

69.speaker: PENGUIN
69.character: 気が散るから　話かけないで
69.definition: Don't talk to me. It's distracting.

70.speaker: PANDA
70.character: そういえばさぁ　この間ね…
70.definition: Oh yeah, the other day... I just told you not to talk to me.

71.speaker: POLAR BEAR
71.character: ３　楽しい会話　不合格

72.speaker: POLAR BEAR
72.character: もっと盛り上げないと
72.definition: You have to enhance the mood more.

73.speaker: PENGUIN
73.character: だって　男３人でドライブじゃ 盛り上がらないよ
73.definition: But it's hard to enhance the mood when it's three guys.

74.speaker: POLAR BEAR
74.character: 予行演習したいって言ったの ペンギンさんでしょ
74.definition: You're the one that said you wanted to do a practice run.

76.speaker: POLAR BEAR
76.definition: Looks like you've left me no choice.

77.speaker: POLAR BEAR
77.character: うわ～　ステキな景色ね

79.speaker: POLAR BEAR
79.character: 僕がペン子さんのふりしてあげるから
79.definition: I'll pretend to be Miss Penko. So you're a girl from now on, Polar Bear?

80.speaker: POLAR BEAR
80.character: 私　日焼け止め持ってくるの忘れちゃった

81.speaker: POLAR BEAR
81.character: ちょっと　それじゃダメ
81.definition: Hey, that's not going to work. What should I say?

82.speaker: POLAR BEAR
82.character: とにかく褒めて　私を褒めて
82.definition: First you need to compliment me. Just compliment me.

84.speaker: PENGUIN
84.character: シ　シロクマちゃんて 色白できれいだね
84.definition: Y-You're so fair-skinned and pretty, Miss Polar Bear.

85.speaker: POLAR BEAR
85.character: やだ　ペンギンさんたら

86.speaker: POLAR BEAR
86.character: あら　ごめんなさい

87.speaker: POLAR BEAR
87.character: 私　最近　太っちゃって
87.definition: I seem to have gained a little bit of weight lately.

90.speaker: PENGUIN
90.character: シ　シロクマちゃんみたいにポッチャリしてる 女の子のほうが　かわいいよ
90.definition: Chubby girls like you are much cuter, Miss Polar Bear. Really?! Miss Polar Bear, your nails! Your nails!

91.speaker: POLAR BEAR
91.character: あら　ごめんなさい
91.definition: Oh dear. I'm sorry, did my nails hurt?

93.speaker: PENGUIN
93.character: シロクマちゃんの爪　頑丈でステキ
93.definition: Your nails are so sturdy, they're truly fantastic.

97.speaker: PANDA
97.character: よかったね　ペンギンさん

98.speaker: POLAR BEAR
98.definition: What should we do for lunch?

99.speaker: PANDA
99.definition: I want bamboo grass! Somewhere that Miss Penko would like.

101.speaker: POLAR BEAR
101.character: 全然　レストランじゃないわね
101.definition: This isn't much of a restaurant.

102.speaker: PENGUIN
102.character: 本番ではステキなシーフードレストランに行くから
102.definition: When it's the real thing, we'll be going to a fancy seafood restaurant!

103.speaker: POLAR BEAR
103.character: すみません　サーモンください
103.definition: Excuse me. I'd like some salmon.

105.speaker: PENGUIN
105.character: シロクマくんが　食べきっちゃったよ　ここのサーモン
105.definition: You ate all of the salmon in the place, Polar Bear.

106.speaker: POLAR BEAR
106.character: じゃあ　いきましょうか

107.speaker: POLAR BEAR
107.character: もちろん　ペンギンさんのおごりね
107.definition: Of course, you're paying, Mr. Penguin.

109.definition: You were going to make a girl pay on the date?

112.speaker: PENGUIN
112.character: ４　おいしい食事も合格だね
112.definition: No. 4, Delicious Meal: I passed that, right? Conveyor belt sushi feels strange for a date.

114.speaker: POLAR BEAR
114.character: じゃ　合格でいいよ　合格で…
114.definition: All right, we'll say you passed.

115.speaker: POLAR BEAR
115.character: 会話…　ないんだけど

116.speaker: PENGUIN
116.character: そこは　もう合格したから

118.speaker: POLAR BEAR
118.character: ムード　盛り上げないと
118.definition: You have to enhance the mood.

120.speaker: POLAR BEAR
120.character: 会話が途切れたら　ＢＧМとか
120.definition: When the conversation is paused, you need something like background music.

121.speaker: PENGUIN
121.character: ＣＤ　持ってきてないよ

122.speaker: PANDA
122.character: じゃあ　僕　歌うよ

123.speaker: PANDA
123.definition: Sleep, sleep, in your mother's embrace.

125.speaker: PANDA
125.character: ペンギンさん！　眠っちゃ　ダメ！！
125.definition: You're not supposed to fall asleep, Mr. Penguin!

126.speaker: PENGUIN
126.character: なんで　子守唄　歌うの！？
126.definition: Why would you sing a lullaby?!

127.speaker: POLAR BEAR
127.character: これじゃ　合格点　あげられないね
127.definition: I can't give you a passing grade at this rate.

129.speaker: PENGUIN
129.character: 海　見たら　絶対　盛り上がるから！
129.definition: The ocean will enhance the mood! Especially for penguins!

133.speaker: PANDA
133.character: あっ…　ペンギンさん

134.speaker: PANDA
134.definition: One hundred yen! One hundred yen!

135.speaker: PENGUIN
135.character: もう見なくていいから…
135.definition: You don't need to look at it anymore.

136.speaker: POLAR BEAR
136.character: もう… 道　間違えるなんて　最低
136.definition: Seriously. How could you have gone the wrong way?

137.speaker: PANDA
137.character: ペン子さん　怒って帰っちゃうよ？
137.definition: Miss Penko will get mad and go home.

138.speaker: PENGUIN
138.character: 大丈夫…　これは　予行演習
138.definition: It'll be okay, this is just a practice run.

139.speaker: PENGUIN
139.character: 今から行くと　ちょうど 海に夕日が沈む頃だから…
139.definition: If we go now, the sun will be setting across the ocean.

140.speaker: PENGUIN
140.character: 絶対　ロマンチックだよ！！
140.definition: It'll be romantic, no matter what! It's the ocean! But... We missed the sunset.

141.speaker: POLAR BEAR
141.character: ５　ロマンチックなムードは　不合格と…

142.speaker: PENGUIN
142.character: や…　夜景も　きれいじゃない？
142.definition: I-Isn't the night scenery pretty, too?

143.speaker: PENGUIN
143.character: ほらほら　ムードが盛り上がってるよ！
143.definition: See? The mood is getting better!

144.speaker: POLAR BEAR
144.character: じゃあ　いってみる？　告白
144.definition: Then do you want to move on to the confession?

146.speaker: POLAR BEAR
146.character: さあ　ペンギンさん

147.speaker: POLAR BEAR
147.character: 私への思いのたけを　熱く語って
147.definition: Tell me how you really feel about me, passionately.

149.speaker: PENGUIN
149.character: ずっと…　好きでした

151.speaker: PENGUIN
151.definition: Would you... go out with me?

155.speaker: PENGUIN
155.character: いや…　練習とわかっていても ドキドキするよね
155.definition: Even though it's practice, that was nerve-wracking.

156.speaker: POLAR BEAR
156.character: じゃあ… まあ　合格ってことで

157.speaker: POLAR BEAR
157.character: はい　ラブラブ免許
157.definition: Here, your love love license. Yay!

159.speaker: PANDA
159.character: デート　どうだった？

161.speaker: SASAKO
161.character: ありがとうございます

164.speaker: PENGUIN
164.character: いや　ほら…　まだ夏じゃないし 海へドライブには早いよ
164.definition: Well, it's not summer yet. It's not the right season for a drive to the ocean.

166.speaker: PANDA
166.character: ペンギンさん　ペンギンさん

168.speaker: PANDA
168.character: どうしたら　黙っていてもアイドルたちから告白されるかな
168.definition: How can I get idols to confess their love  without me having to work?

169.speaker: PENGUIN
169.definition: Well, that's really impudent. Let's finish it, Polar Bear.

170.speaker: POLAR BEAR
170.character: 次回　しろくまカフェ
170.definition: Next time on Polar Bear's Café...

172.speaker: PENGUIN
172.character: しろくまカフェだけでいいでしょう
172.definition: How about just Polar Bear's Café?
